tooltip-pt-uploads: Tooltip of the link in personal tools menu.
uploadslink-toobox-label:
Label of the link in Tools box. 

Parameters:
* $1 - username

The tooltip for the link is {{msg-mw|Tooltip-tb-uploads}}.

This message appears in the sidebar next to {{msg-mw|Contributions}}, so consider phrasing them in a similar way.
